seo.title: Sora 2 Pro ‚Äì Longer AI Videos with Audio & Enhanced Prompt Control
seo.description: Create longer, more immersive AI videos from text or images using Sora 2 Pro. Native voice, ambient sound, prompt chaining, and advanced control via MaxVideoAI.

hero.title: Sora 2 Pro ‚Äì Extended Video Generation with Full Audio & Scene Control
hero.intro: Sora 2 Pro builds on the core engine of Sora 2, unlocking longer durations, multi-scene prompts, and tighter control over audio+visual continuity. Chain scenes, direct camera moves, or animate reference art for storytelling that stays on-brand.
hero.badge: 720p/1080p ¬∑ 4‚Äì12s ¬∑ Text or Image input ¬∑ Audio toggle

overview: Generate longer AI videos with sound and scene control using Sora 2 Pro. Perfect for storytelling, explainers, and branded motion design‚Äîstarting from image or text prompts.

custom.heroDesc1: Sora 2 Pro is the premium sibling to Sora 2. You get 720p or 1080p output, longer cinematic control, explicit audio toggle, and richer prompt chaining for multi-beat sequences‚Äîideal for ads, trailers, and client-ready deliveries.
custom.heroDesc2: Prototype fast with Sora 2, then move into Sora 2 Pro to regenerate your winning shots in 1080p with tighter control over timing, motion, and sound.
heroHighlights: Upgrade path from Sora 2 prototyping to Pro finals
custom.specTitle: Real Specs ‚Äì Sora 2 Pro in MaxVideoAI (720p/1080p, 4‚Äì12s)

custom.specValueProp: Sora 2 Pro is for polished, 1080p outputs with audio control and multi-scene continuity‚Äîideal once your Sora 2 explorations are locked.

custom.promptTitle: Prompting Sora 2 Pro for Cinematic Control
custom.promptIntro: For Sora 2 Pro, treat prompts like a mini storyboard with audio cues and timing.
promptPatternSteps: Scene beats with durations per beat
Camera language per scene (push, dolly, tilt, handheld)
Audio cues (voice-over lines, ambience, FX, music tone)
custom.promptSkeleton: Scene 1 (4s): [subject/action], [camera move], [lighting], [audio cue]. Scene 2 (4s): [subject/action], [camera move], [transition], [audio cue], 1080p, 16:9.
custom.promptSkeletonNote: Lay it out beat by beat; Sora 2 Pro will execute with higher fidelity.
custom.imageIntro: Lock style with a still, then animate with precise motion and audio cues.
imageFlow: Create or import a branded keyframe (style locked).
Send it to Sora 2 Pro as Image ‚Üí Video.
Describe motion per beat and any sound you need (VO, ambience, FX).
Regenerate to polish timing while preserving your look.
imageWhy: Campaign intros that must stay on-brand
custom.multishotTitle: Multi-Shot & Sequenced Clips in Sora 2 Pro
custom.multishotIntro1: Chain 2‚Äì3 scenes with explicit timing to keep continuity tight.
custom.multishotIntro2: Use the audio toggle and cues to align voice-over, FX, and music hits.
multishotTips: Cap at 3 scenes for clarity in 12 seconds.
Repeat core descriptors (outfit, setting, lighting) per scene.
Specify camera per beat: push-in, crane up, handheld glide.
Write the transition in the prompt (match cut, whip pan, crossfade).
custom.demoPromptLabel: Prompt ‚Äì Wearable tech launch (16:9, audio on)
demoPrompt: Scene 1 (4s): Macro close-up of a titanium smartwatch rotating on a glossy turntable, soft studio light, voice-over: 'Introducing Aurum Pro.'
Scene 2 (4s): Lifestyle shot of a runner checking the watch at blue hour in a city rooftop track, camera dolly-in, ambient city hum + subtle synth pulse.
Scene 3 (4s): UI close-up of the watch face animating, hand interacts, match cut to product floating on black, audio swell then resolves.
Transitions: match cut between scenes, gentle crossfade on audio layers.
Audio: voice-over + ambient + light synth bed.
demoNotes: Demonstrates camera control, audio cues, and consistency across product + lifestyle + UI beats.
Use the same structure for premium client cutdowns: intro, context, hero close.
strengths: Audio toggle with explicit cue handling
Great for ads, trailers, explainers, client decks
Pairs with Sora 2 for prototype ‚Üí Pro finalize
boundaries: Still no long-form editing; stitch multiple renders
Needs clear continuity notes to avoid drift
Tiny on-screen text can remain challenging
custom.tipsFooter: Write like a shot list. Declare beats, cameras, and audio‚ÄîSora 2 Pro will honor them with more fidelity than Sora 2.
safetyRules: No real people, public figures, minors, hateful or violent content.
Do not use likeness without consent.
Sensitive prompts or references may be blocked.
safetyInterpretation: Generic characters and scenes are fine.
Famous people or sensitive topics can be filtered.
custom.safetyNote: Stay within safe use to keep Sora 2 Pro reliable for production work.
comparisonPoints: Prototype in Sora 2 (720p) for speed and cost efficiency.
Finalize in Sora 2 Pro (1080p) for polish, audio control, and continuity.
Same workflow: swap engines in the same GUI when you‚Äôre ready to upscale.

faqs.q: Does Sora 2 Pro include audio control?
faqs.a: Yes. Toggle audio on/off in MaxVideoAI, and write voice/ambience/FX cues into your prompt.

faqs.q: Is it more expensive than Sora 2?
faqs.a: Yes‚ÄîSora 2 Pro is priced higher per second. Check the live rate in Generate before running a job.

faqs.q: Should I prototype in Sora 2 first?
faqs.a: Usually yes: explore cheap and fast in Sora 2, then regenerate your selects in Pro at 1080p with audio control.

faqs.q: Can I do image-to-video with Sora 2 Pro?
faqs.a: Yes. Upload a still (PNG/JPG/WEBP/GIF/AVIF) up to ~50 MB, then describe motion and audio per beat.

custom.finalPara2: Prototype in Sora 2, then step into Sora 2 Pro when it‚Äôs time to polish and deliver in 1080p.

promptStructure.title: Prompt Structure
promptStructure.quote: Scene 1 ‚Üí Neon-lit bazaar at dusk, camera pushes through stalls, layered percussion builds ‚Üí Scene 2 ‚Üí Rooftop skyline reveal, voice-over continues narration.
promptStructure.description: Lay out each beat to keep multi-scene briefs coherent:
steps: Break prompts into Scene 1 / Scene 2 segments
Specify camera movement + duration per scene
Call out audio cues (voice, ambience, FX)
Mention what should stay consistent (characters, wardrobe)
Add transitions (match cuts, crossfade, whip pan, etc.)

prompts.title: Multi-scene legend opener
prompts.prompt: Scene 1 ‚Üí A medieval city under the stars, camera slowly pans above rooftops, lute music plays, voice-over: 'Peace reigned for a century.' ‚Üí Scene 2 ‚Üí A rider gallops across the plains at sunrise, orchestral swell, zoom-in to sword hilt glowing.
prompts.notes: Use multi-prompt chaining to stitch scenes together in a single render.

prompts.title: Torchlit discovery
prompts.prompt: Scene 1 ‚Üí Interior of a jungle temple at dusk, drums echo in the background, voice-over: 'Legends speak of a guardian.' ‚Üí Scene 2 ‚Üí Torchlit hallway, camera glides toward ancient glyphs as the music builds.
prompts.notes: Start from a detailed concept still to keep glyphs and lighting consistent.

faqs.q: Does Sora 2 Pro always output audio?
faqs.a: Audio is on by default for lip-sync and sound design, but you can toggle it off in the composer if you only need visuals.

pricingNotes: Live pricing updates inside the Generate workspace. Check the current rate before you run a job.
